channel.title: Projects on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Home

item.title: Easy QMICLI Modem Handler bash script
item.description: A simple to use modem_control bash script to interact with a modem device with qmicli.

item.title: GitHub action - upload-play-store
item.description: A simple GitHub Action to upload an Android App Bundle (.aab file) to the Google Play Store using the Play Developer API.

item.title: GitHub action - javascript-obfuscator
item.description: Obfuscate javascript and node with Github action to secure your code. The Github action uses the javascript-obfuscator

item.title: GitHub action - sign mender artifact
item.description: Github action to create mender artifact.

item.title: GitHub action - create mender artifact
item.description: Github action to create mender artifact.

item.title: GitHub action - fetch full release data
item.description: Github action to fetch all data from a release. Use the latest release tag, body content, or download release assets of a GitHub release. The data can be retrieved from public and private repositories.

item.title: Flutter package - BLE send splitted data chunks
item.description: Flutter package which handles data packages to use with bluetooth low energy. It splits data into chunks based on the MTU size.
